TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit OpenTypeMethods extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Used to perform late-bound operations on open properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used when you implement a custom data service provider for [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Add method adds two values without overflow checking.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Substring (object targetString, object startIndex);

The starting index for the substring.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Services.Providers.OpenTypeMethods.Substring%2A> method returns the `length` number of characters from `startIndex` through the end of the `targetString`.
